events.text: Did you know that because of the [b]Data Privacy of 2012[/b], we have the right to choose the data that companies collect from us!
This is why applications ask for our permission on which data we allow them to collect.
Let's take a look at the permissions that you have allowed.
It looks like you have allowed the app to [b]always[/b] access your [i][Scene2_AA][/i].
This will allow the app to know your information  even if the app is closed!
It looks like you have allowed the app to access your [i][Scene2_AWAIU][/i] while the app is in use.
This is better than allowing the app to always access these data.
We can also set it to ask every time to give us more control on our data.
